column2: obnoxious and over-inflated sense of product. The people are rude
column3: we brought our extremely well behaved children and they made no attempt to correct the fact that one yogurt was missing blueberries. So as any of us with children know
column4: if one has it they both want it. When I asked they said it doesn't come with blueberries. When I showed them that clearly one came with them
column5: they said it was a mistake. No attempt was made to resolve the situation even after asking the head bozo. The people are all a$$holes
column7: and the cuisine perfectly reflects the management
column10: pretentious and lacking in all elements of substance.
